items.content_html: A lightweight screen recording and editing tool with zoom animations, cursor tracking, and background customization. An open-source alternative to Screen.studio.
items.title: njraladdin/screen-demo: A lightweight screen recording and editing tool with zoom animations, cursor tracking, and background customization. An open-source alternative to Screen.studio.

items.title: mutagen-d/markov-chain-base: A lightweight and flexible implementation of Markov chains with support for n-grams, text generation, and persistence

items.content_html: The lightweight UI framework for declarative DOM manipulation, alternative to React, Vue and jQuery for small projects.
items.title: echox-js/echox: The lightweight UI framework for declarative DOM manipulation, alternative to React, Vue and jQuery for small projects.

items.content_html: Framely: An open-source, lightweight, multi-tenant drag-and-drop website editor for modern web applications, powered by Next.js
items.title: belastrittmatter/Framely: Framely: An open-source, lightweight, multi-tenant drag-and-drop website editor for modern web applications, powered by Next.js

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
items.title: n1ru4l/envelop: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: Mejiro is a lightweight web viewer with a strong focus on bookmark management.
items.title: andots/mejiro: Mejiro is a lightweight web viewer with a strong focus on bookmark management.

items.content_html: A lightweight event bus written in Typescript
items.title: kitbagjs/events: A lightweight event bus written in Typescript

items.content_html: A lightweight fetching library packed with essential features - retries, interceptors, request deduplication and much more, all while still retaining a similar API surface with regular Fetch.
items.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A lightweight fetching library packed with essential features - retries, interceptors, request deduplication and much more, all while still retaining a similar API surface with regular Fetch.

items.content_html: A very lightweight, RxPlayer-specialized, remote inspector
items.title: canalplus/RxPaired: A very lightweight, RxPlayer-specialized, remote inspector

items.content_html: A lightweight, browser-based code collaboration tool that allows multiple users to share their thoughts and build things together seamlessly.
items.title: jayyprajapati/code-collaboration-tool: A lightweight, browser-based code collaboration tool that allows multiple users to share their thoughts and build things together seamlessly.

items.content_html: TeqFW: Lightweight web server with HTTP/2 support for building modern web applications.
items.title: teqfw/web: TeqFW: Lightweight web server with HTTP/2 support for building modern web applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight next-gen data explorer - Postgres, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, Redis, MariaDB, Elastic Search, and Clickhouse with Chat interface
items.title: clidey/whodb: A lightweight next-gen data explorer - Postgres, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, Redis, MariaDB, Elastic Search, and Clickhouse with Chat interface

items.content_html: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
items.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.

items.content_html: Easy & lightweight solution for cross-browser scrollbar hiding. Built for performance & minimal package size.
items.title: FRSOURCE/FRS-hide-scrollbar: Easy & lightweight solution for cross-browser scrollbar hiding. Built for performance & minimal package size.

items.content_html: A lightweight, universal utility for managing web storage based on the MDN Web Storage API specification. It provides a consistent API for core storage operations, bulk actions, JSON handling, and TTL (time-to-live) support. The library works with localStorage, sessionStorage, or any custom storage-like interface.
items.title: alphadevking/universal-webstorage: A lightweight, universal utility for managing web storage based on the MDN Web Storage API specification. It provides a consistent API for core storage operations, bulk actions, JSON handling, and TTL (time-to-live) support. The library works with localStorage, sessionStorage, or any custom storage-like interface.

items.content_html: A lightweight Markdown compiler built with TypeScript that converts Markdown into HTML.
items.title: zouheir-senan/markdown-compiler-ts: A lightweight Markdown compiler built with TypeScript that converts Markdown into HTML.

items.content_html: A tiny lightweight library for Fuzzy Search
items.title: ad1992/fuzzify: A tiny lightweight library for Fuzzy Search

items.content_html: A custom, lightweight wheel select element
items.title: NooaLumi/UnraWheel.js: A custom, lightweight wheel select element

items.content_html: A lightweight web app that allows users to search for countries and view their flags instantly. Features real-time auto-suggestions, a dark mode toggle, and a responsive design for seamless performance.
items.title: direction44/Country-Flag-Finder: A lightweight web app that allows users to search for countries and view their flags instantly. Features real-time auto-suggestions, a dark mode toggle, and a responsive design for seamless performance.
